context: Great, do you have any good comedy suggestions?
Sure, there's Ghostbusters (1984) or Anchorman or Borat (2006) . Have you seen any of those?

Ghostbusters (1984) is a classic, i watched it decades ago. Would definitely enjoy anything similar to it. Borat (2006) i didn't like it, comedy there is vulgar. Haven't seen Anchorman, did you like it?

Yes Anchorman is definitely a classic. Borat (2006) has good social commentary, but I understand it's not for some. Stripes (1981) and Beetlejuice (1988) are both from the same era and have a similar feel as Ghostbusters (1984)
You are right Borat (2006) is not for everyone. I would watch Anchorman based on your suggestion. I absolutely loved Beetlejuice (1988) , story is phenomenal and great humor throughout the film.
resp: Yes! I love Beetlejuice (1988) too. Have a good one.
